title: Gorgeous T200 Fatima Phil. Athletics Graded VG

posts.post_title: Gorgeous T200 Fatima Phil. Athletics Graded VG
posts.post_content:
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t-party/13701/t200-philadelphia-american[/IMG]

Mack, Baker, Plank, Collins & Bender

5 Hall of Famers for only $47 each plus $7 shipping.

BVG 3 with basically only a modest right upper corner crease, a smaller left upper corner crease and a little border chipping in left lower corner.
.
This one won't last long at $242 shipped. (I hope)
Today is the last chance to purchase in November.
